desc.zh-CN: 开源个人 AI 助手，运行在你自己的机器上，通过 WhatsApp/Telegram/Discord 等聊天应用交互。
desc.en-US: Open-source personal AI assistant that runs on your own machine, interacting via WhatsApp/Telegram/Discord and more.

jsComment.zh-CN: 2026 年最令人兴奋的开源 AI 项目，没有之一。
jsComment.en-US: The most exciting open-source AI project of 2026, bar none.

desc.zh-CN: OpenClaw 官方技能市场，下载社区创建的技能扩展你的 AI 助手能力。
desc.en-US: Official OpenClaw skill marketplace. Download community-created skills to extend your AI assistant.

jsComment.zh-CN: 技能生态是 OpenClaw 的灵魂，这里能找到各种神奇的扩展。
jsComment.en-US: The skill ecosystem is the soul of OpenClaw. Find all kinds of amazing extensions here.

desc.zh-CN: OpenClaw 核心代码仓库，开源、可 hack、可自托管。
desc.en-US: OpenClaw core repository. Open-source, hackable, self-hostable.

jsComment.zh-CN: 代码质量很高，社区活跃度惊人，值得 star 和 watch。
jsComment.en-US: High code quality, amazing community activity. Worth a star and watch.

summary.zh-CN: JS ClawHub 正式上线。一个由 JS 策展的 OpenClaw 生态项目导航站，帮你发现最好的技能、集成和教程。
summary.en-US: JS ClawHub is officially live. A curated OpenClaw ecosystem navigation site by JS, helping you discover the best skills, integrations, and tutorials.

title.zh-CN: 什么是 OpenClaw：开源个人 AI 助手
title.en-US: What is OpenClaw: The Open Source Personal AI Assistant

summary.zh-CN: 深入了解 OpenClaw——2026 年最令人兴奋的开源 AI 项目。它如何改变我们与 AI 交互的方式？
summary.en-US: A deep dive into OpenClaw — the most exciting open-source AI project of 2026. How is it changing the way we interact with AI?

summary.zh-CN: 花了一天把 OpenClaw 的代码和文档捋了一遍。部署逻辑、核心组件、设备要求，我的学习笔记。
summary.en-US: Spent a day going through OpenClaw's code and docs. Deployment logic, core components, device requirements — my study notes.
